title: Global semicon sales seen rising to US$611.2b in 2024 and US$687.4b in 2025, says SIA
summary:
Global semiconductor sales are projected to increase 16.0% in 2024 and 12.5% in 2025, according to the US-based Semiconductor Industry Association (SIA).

In a statement on Thursday, the SIA said global semiconductor industry sales rose 15.8% year-on-year to US$46.4 billion (RM217.95 billion) in April from US$40.1 billion a year earlier.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (June 7): Global semiconductor sales are projected to increase 16.0% in 2024 and 12.5% in 2025, according to the US-based Semiconductor Industry Association (SIA).

In a statement on Thursday, the SIA said global semiconductor industry sales rose 15.8% year-on-year to US$46.4 billion (RM217.95 billion) in April from US$40.1 billion a year earlier.

It said the figure was 1.1% higher than US$45.9 billion in March.
